relics.name: Tori's gift
relics.description: Start each combat with a random Gene.

relics.name: Nimble Boots
relics.description: Whenever you play 5 or more cards in a turn, draw an additional card at the start of your next turn.

relics.name: Power Focus
relics.description: The first Gene you Evoke each turn is evoked twice.

relics.name: Magic Focus
relics.description: The first Skill you play each combat is played twice.

relics.name: Scout Medal
relics.description: At the start of the combat Fate 1 card of each type.

relics.name: Strength Focus
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.
relics.flavorText: I'm not sure if it still works.

relics.name: Old Outfit
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first Gene you Channel each turn is removed.
relics.flavorText: My favourite outfit, when I was human.

relics.name: Tori
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional Orb slot and random genes in all Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: She's found her way back to you.

relics.name: Whip
relics.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take 2 damage.
relics.flavorText: I can use this as a weapon?

potions.name: Mutagen
potions.description: Select up to 2 genes you don't already have and Channel them.

keywords.name: Growth
keywords.description: Upon reaching 2 Growth gain 1 Energy and reduce Growth by 2

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Increases the damage of your next Attack.

keywords.name: Drone
keywords.description: Drones are 0 cost attacks which benefit from Potency, are Ethereal and Exhaust when played.

keywords.name: Adapt
keywords.description:
Consume a channeled Gene. Add its effect to the card until the end of the combat and shuffle this card in your draw pile.
Adapted effects target the same enemy as the card if possible.

keywords.name: Form
keywords.description: Trigger the following effect if you have a Gene of this type, otherwise Channel one.

keywords.name: Fate X
keywords.description: Put random cards from your draw pile matching X on top of your draw pile, then Scry them.

keywords.name: Lust
keywords.description: Reduce the base damage of the next attack by this amount.

keywords.name: Rage
keywords.description: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain this amount of Block.

keywords.name: Randomized
keywords.description: Randomized Forms are selected when the card is created and vary from a card to another.

keywords.name: Shadows
keywords.description: When Shadows reaches its threshold it deals 2 damage per stack and applies 1 Weak to all enemies. The first threshold is 1.

keywords.name: Shift
keywords.description: Recreate the gene at the back of the orb line.

mods.name: The Evolution
mods.credits:
- Syvaron for most card art and the game that inspired this character. If you are above 18 or 21 years old you can check out his game, Portals of Phereon. 
 - Verburner for the character model, additional card arts and extensive playtesting. Check out his character, The Marked, as well as his other mods! 
 - Johnny Devo for the Mystic, which I used as a base. There might be a few assets haven't replaced yet, those are his. 
 - The STS modding community on Discord. Thanks for your help and companionship!
mods.description:
Adds a new character: The Evolution. 

Wielding the powers of a fallen god this shapeshifter climbs the Spire to save her fading worlds.
